body_html: This diff doesn't actually help. You've traded new Tensor for new IntrusiveTensorPtr, which is basically the same thing as Tensor. In particular, you've still got two indirections in blob.
body_text: This diff doesn't actually help. You've traded new Tensor for new IntrusiveTensorPtr, which is basically the same thing as Tensor. In particular, you've still got two indirections in blob.
body: This diff doesn't actually help. You've traded `new Tensor` for `new IntrusiveTensorPtr`, which is basically the same thing as Tensor. In particular, you've still got two indirections in blob.
